title: AI pendants back in vogue at CES after early setback
description: Pendants and brooches packed with artificial intelligence abounded at CES 2026, using cameras and microphones to watch and listen through the day like a vigilant personal assistant.
content:

title: India To Be Part Of Pax Silica, Says US Ambassador Sergio Gor As Tech Partnerships Deepen
description: India will be invited to join Pax Silica, a US-led strategic initiative aimed at securing critical supply chains across silicon, advanced manufacturing and artificial intelligence, new US ambassador Sergio Gor said on Monday. Gor underscored continued engagement between the two sides, even as global technology and supply-chain politics become more complex. “Real friends can disagree but always resolve their differences,” he said, adding that “both sides continue to be actively engaged.”
content:

title: AI in the Village: It's not just sci-fi anymore
description: Artificial Intelligence is revolutionising rural India. Farmers are getting credit and precision farming advice. Artisans are reaching consumers directly. Youth are gaining job-ready skills. Healthcare is becoming more accessible. AI is bridging the gap between rural aspirations and modern opportunities, bringing dignity and personalised solutions to every villager.

title: Malaysia and Indonesia block Musk’s Grok over explicit AI images
description: Malaysia and Indonesia have become the first countries to block Grok, the artificial intelligence chatbot developed by Elon Musk’s xAI, after authorities said it was being misused to generate sexually explicit and non-consensual images.
content:
The moves reflect growing global concern over generative AI tools that can produce realistic images, sound and text, while existing safeguards fail to prevent their abuse.
The Grok chatbot, which is accessed through Mr Musk’s social media platform X,... [2579 chars]

description: A growing number of tech firms are targeting the lucrative health care market, betting that advances in artificial intelligence can help parse patterns in users’ health data to provide individualized medical recommendations
